manageExams.title: Exam Management

tooltips.startWithinWindow: Start / Resume exam (within real time window)

create.title: Create exam?
create.text: Do you want to create this exam with the selected rooms and supervisors?

update.title: Update exam?
update.text: Are you sure you want to save these changes?

delete.title: Delete exam?

start.title: Start exam now?
start.text: This will set status to RUNNING (allowed only within the real time window).

end.title: End exam now?
end.text: This will set status to ENDED. You can still START again while the exam is ACTIVE by time window.

messages.autoAssignCreated: Auto-Assign draft created. Review rooms/supervisors, then Create.

errors.invalidStartEnd: Please enter valid Start/End date and time.
errors.endAfterStart: End time must be after Start time.
errors.addAtLeastOneRoom: Please add at least 1 classroom (or use Auto-Assign).
errors.assignSupervisorEachRoom: Please assign a supervisor for each classroom (or use Auto-Assign in Create modal).
errors.cannotStartYet: Cannot start exam yet (start time hasn't arrived).
errors.totalStudentsDigits: Total students must be a valid non-negative integer (digits only).
errors.totalStudentsGreaterThanZero: Total students must be greater than 0 to use Auto-Assign.
errors.requestedRoomsDigits: Requested rooms must be a valid non-negative integer (digits only).

conflicts.title: Schedule conflict: same classroom(s) used in overlapping time.

details.title: â‘  Exam Details

autoAssign.title: â‘¡ Auto-Assign (optional)
autoAssign.desc: Computes rooms by students (cap=25) and assigns 1 supervisor per room + lecturers grouping (1 per 3 rooms).

rooms.title: â‘¢ Classrooms & Supervisors
rooms.desc: You can add/remove rooms. Each room must have a supervisor.

fields.lecturerHint: Main lecturer (auto-assign may override for grouping)
